TopicTitle: [UNOFFICIAL] Estimated 0.25 Release Date: October 16, 1 year Anniversary of 0.22!

Articles.Content: I think KSP 0.25 will be released on the 16th of October, since that was the day that Career Mode, 0.22 was released!
Since Media Release is confirmed for today, the release will 99% next week. Which isn't including the 16th
I think you should edit the thread's title a bit, it looks like an official statement.
Max even said in the lasted squadcast that they are making sure that it wont be released like 2 weeks after the media release like it has in the past.
It is a good opportunity though, career mode is a backbone now.
INb4 lock! I think it will be on tuesday or wednesday.

2.3 Forbidden messages

Messages that inquire about release dates for future versions of KSP.

This thread is really close to this rule guys, speculation is fine but it's best to wait for an official announcement, and Commissioner Tadpole is right, this looks too official.

I'm going to edit the title
This just inspired me to open up the version history in the wiki and calculate the average development time for updates.

I cannot wait that long.

All these release videos really build the hype

Ah good, it might be ready for me next weekend if I am lucky!

Meanwhile the game is still quite awesome.
It will be anytime soon for sure. No need to click or discuss for me...

I love how there's an almost 10:1 balance against 0.25 coming out in two week's time, I suspect because like me everyone wants the update this week, and hang any meaningful and sentimental reasons for not doing it this week!
Honestly I expect it sooner. All those videos coming out over the weekend make me tempted to think it's coming out this week, or at least this coming weekend.

Media group videos usually mean that the update is almost done.

This means we're looking at next/this week.

Chances are they'll release in the beginning of the week to give them time to patch bugs.

This narrows it down to Monday or Tuesday, maybe Wednesday.

As I heard someone else say it, it's probably Tuesday because that gives SQUAD one day of last minute preparation, and the rest of the week to patch post-release bugs.
Its done when its done, and then we will be clamoring for .25.1 because .25.0 is broken somehow. Lol
By guess is Wednesday, (though im hoping Monday Morning )

Not trying to be abrasive, but how can I not inquire as to general release times for updates because of trying to see whether I should wait to start a new game, which would require speculation, but we can run polls and have posts about the expected release date, directly, which also requires speculation (unless a member broke confidentiality)?

Just want a better understanding of the rules so I'm sorry if I seem too direct.

Edited October 6, 2014 by Friend Bear
flow
They like doing Tuesdays. So likely then. That way they can not do the dev reports.
I'd say it will be much sooner than the 16th.
It's been a year since 0.22?

It's been a year since 0.22?

.22 was forever ago.
The Next Devnote Tuesday: "It's been a pretty slow day. We had a little meeting, we released 0.25, the coffee machine broke... mostly just small stuff like that."
Yeah, I have a feeling they are going to shoot for Tuesday just to not have to write another long DevNote.

Eh eh eh - Maxmaps said he would write a devblog for .26 after the .25 release, so they will be working on .26 and have something to tell us one way or the other.

I just had a thought ...

If I have more than one strategy active in the admin building - one giving more money for science and one more science for money (or any such combination) - which is handled first? Or did I forsee a bug? Or is it even possible to generate such a "circle"? (Have been watching the videos on my netbook, resolution/screen size was not reader-friendly regarding the text in the admin building, so I would not know.)

I never realised .22 was that old.
